p: Huang et al. previously reported that exposure to SEB seven days after a primary infection with X31 does not change the frequency of TCR Vβ8.3 + cells among NP 366-374-specific T CD8 (an immunodominant population in C57BL/6 mice) upon a PR8 challenge [ 80]. In contrast with our recall system, Huang et al. examined NP 366-374-specific T CD8 within the BAL of intranasally primed-boosted mice. MHC II molecules in the C57BL/6 strain have a notoriously low affinity for SEB, which may explain why a larger dose of SEB (100 μg) had to be administered. Therefore, even though NP 366-374-specific T CD8 preferentially use Vβ8.3, they may not establish strong and/or long enough contacts with SEB and MHC II + APCs.
